entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023
